00006 Task2::Task2()
00007 {
00008         kout.setpos ( 1, 10 );
00009         kout << "Keyboard Interrupt: " << endl;
00010         
00011         kout.setpos ( 31, 1 );
00012         kout << "OOStuBs - Task 2" << endl << endl;
00013 
00014         cpu.enable_int();
00015 }
00016 
00017 
00018 Task2::~Task2()
00019 {
00020         cpu.disable_int();
00021 }

00023 
00024 void Task2::action()
00025 {
00026         int x, y;
00027         unsigned char i = 0;
00028 
00029         kout.getpos ( x, y );
00030         while ( 1 ) {
00031                 kout.setpos ( x, y );
00032                 for ( unsigned short j = 0;j < 39;j++ ) {
00033                         kout << "-";
00034                 }
00035                 kout.flush();
00036                 switch ( i++ % 4 ) {
00037                         case ( 0 ) : kout << "//";
00038                                 break;
00039                         case ( 1 ) : kout << "--";
00040                                 break;
00041                         case ( 2 ) : kout << "\\\\";
00042                                 break;
00043                         case ( 3 ) : kout << "||";
00044                                 break;
00045                 }
00046                 for ( unsigned short j = 0;j < 39;j++ ) {
00047                         kout << "-";
00048                 }
00049                 kout << endl;
00050         }
00051 }
